Description: Remote control for MOTU AVB Audio Interfaces

com.simonedenadai.motu-avb.togglevalues.Name: Toggle Values
com.simonedenadai.motu-avb.togglevalues.Tooltip: Toggle between 2 values in a channel

com.simonedenadai.motu-avb.setvalue.Name: Set Value
com.simonedenadai.motu-avb.setvalue.Tooltip: Sets a value in a channel
